title: Connectivist-Based Mobile Microlearning for GNSS Education Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) principles and surveying techniques
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to strengthen GNSS technology application capabilities. Real-time collaboration and field data analysis are emphasized in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate competency in spatial information analysis through the operation of GNSS (Global Navigation Satellite System) hardware/software.
Learners can share GNSS problem-solving strategies with peers using mobile-based collaboration tools.
Learners can explain GNSS data interpretation and decision-making processes through real-world case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
